title: Beat The Heat
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss which team has the edge after the Celtics beat the Heat to tie the series up at 2, who looks better in the Saban-Fisher feud, and what the Washington Commanders buying land in Virginia means. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: The Celtics beat the Heat to tie the series up 2-2 and the Commanders buy some land.
